attributes.action: Justice for Cruelty to Working Dogs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
Statements that don't actually request any action
